21/* Get size_t, FILE, ssize_t. And getline, if available. */
22# include <stddef.h>
23# include <stdio.h>
24# include <sys/types.h>
25
26#if !HAVE_DECL_GETLINE
27ssize_t getline (char **lineptr, size_t *n, FILE *stream);
28#endif /* !HAVE_GETLINE */
